events.text: Since the day my father went out to buy milk and never came back, our life has been tough in the family.
My mother worked hard to support me, and to make it possible for me to attend a decent school.
Though recently, she hasen't been going to work. She hasen't made delicious meals. She's mostly on bed.
She needs some sort of expensive medicine in 3 days, or she'll die. I have to make money for that...
